audioJson.name: 3/4" U-matic
audioJson.fact1: The 44.1 kHz sampling standard used in Compact Discs was defined by the bandwidth available on this format's tapes
audioJson.fact2: While this format was primarily used to store analog video, it was also used for the storage of digital audio data
audioJson.fact3: All tapes have a round red button on the back that can be removed to prevent accidental recording
